title: Object - Valuation
description: Object describing a valuation used in the cap table

board_approval_date.description: Date on which board approved the valuation. This is essential for 409A valuations, in particular, which require the Board to approve the valuation.

effective_date.description: Date on which this valuation is first valid

valuation_type.description: Seam for supporting different types of valuations in future versions
